page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content: {Football}and{swimming}are the most popular sports.There are other favourites and some of them are running,dancing,ice-skating,racing- cars,baseball,shooting,badmington, sailing,fishing,golfing and darts. People go to Gateshead,Cresswell, Ashington,whitley Bay and Sunderland, all outside morpeth.{Snooker}and {Football}are the favourites people like to watch.Some people go to the Harriers Club in Morpeth.Jim Alder sometimes trains people.There is a good{swimming pool}in Morpeth. some people like visiting friends,Hiking sleeping,music,going on holiday,and reading.A lot of people like visiting the countryside by car.Some people like horse-riding,ice-skating and one person we know likes shooting.Some women like knitting and a lot of men like playing golf.
